title: Thicker Than Blood
description: This  fast-paced paranormal adventure  combines passion and drama with a historical twist.The lives of Madison and Alexandre are plunged into darkness and danger. To save Maddy, Alexandre is forced back to a world he thought was dead and buried. But  time is running out . The chase is on . . ."I simply could not put this book down." ~Books4Tomorrow
author: Shalini Boland
